sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DepartmentDS = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://azurestorage03122020.blob.core.windows.net/azurecontainer1/input/Department.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared EmployeeDS = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://azurestorage03122020.blob.core.windows.net/azurecontainer1/input/Employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DepartmentDS,
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(Source, {"DepID"}, EmployeeDS, {"EmpId"}, "EmployeeDS", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded EmployeeDS" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "EmployeeDS", {"EmpId", "EmpName", "department", "Country"}, {"EmployeeDS.EmpId", "EmployeeDS.EmpName", "EmployeeDS.department", "EmployeeDS.Country"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Expanded EmployeeDS", {"DepID"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns", {"EmployeeDS.EmpId", "EmployeeDS.EmpName", "DeptName", "EmployeeDS.department", "EmployeeDS.Country"}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"EmployeeDS.department"})
in
  #"Removed columns 1";
